title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 54.2 - Purpose and intent
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 54.2 - Purpose and intent

State Regulations

The purpose and intent of this Part is to promulgate a code
of conduct for downhill skiers and ski area operators to minimize the risk of
injury to persons engaged in the sport of downhill skiing and promote safety in
the downhill ski industry. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
54.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
